twitch_info.title: I Wanna Be The Guy - Impossible Mode #8

message.body: accidentally clears guy impossible in 5 minutes

(it was like a couple of days ago to be faire)
woke up at 9, slept to 11, slept again till 2pm, still ded

Hello!! I'm Japanese. I'm your fan :) (Is my speaking English correct...?)
Thank you so much!!!! I'm happy(*Â´Ï‰`*)
that cherry forgot to take the align
that would be a fun death on impossible :)
I know it's his eyebrows but it's still his nose to me
immediate run to third loop inbound
what do the birds even do
TAS strats where you use the bird to skip something when
and if you get unlucky you die
the bosses in this game are very unique
wonder if that's a consistent thing you can do lol
i alrdy cursed you you know its coming
some of them are bloodthirsty while others are patient
why don't I remember this boss existing despite being here last stream
I don't like the vibe of this rom
iÂ´ve beaten the game like 50 times but i still hate that falling block section
there are a lot of things that feel that way in that game
but i kinda like that its that way
we'll cut it in post don't worry
that's the safe strat for that room
wait if game crashes the attempt is kaput?
yeah it is since its basically like hitting the r button
good time to enter the stream?
like 50% of that stuff doesn't appear
oh I thought you cleared it cuz I saw credits and high heart rate lol
it's funny that Mike Tyson is free in this but he is a beast in the original game
ngl, og punch out is so fucking hard
back when games were designed purely to kick your ass lol
nes games had like, barely any memory to hold game data
so you had to give them playing value ya know
He was the first one made, people tend to one-up themselves as they go.
@Taprus_ Early NES games also inherited alot of the design philosophy from the arcade era
not unfair, but to always feel like you could have done it
ill be honest, I definitely do think most nes games are WAY too harsh
@Velatoget If it's fair and properly done yeah, if it's some bs shit, cuz it exist, then hell no
I like permanent game overs eve LUL
though its not really about difficulty, but rather how punishing to mistakes they are
I just enjoy having genuine consequences to my mistakes
To each their own of course
sometimes ill play some old arcade shmup, and in there usually a single death will send you to the fucking shadow realm
game uninstalls itself when you die
like youll die, and woops! all your powerups are gone
in the middle of a stage that fully expects you to be fully powered up
Permanent isn't the word I'm looking for...
Either way, Impossible mode is what I mean
reminds me of the guy trying to beat literally everything in Celeste without dying once
@Velatoget I feel like life does enough of that without me asking, tho I do like a well balanced challenge
I have never played Minecraft. Kind of curious about it
i beat minecraft more times in smp's than in singleplayer worlds
how did u not die earlier lool
I think games like GoldenEye on N64 have a good balance
beating levels saves, but you have to beat the full level
on agent it's not that bad
also ngl, playing n64 fps without an n654 controller is so fucking hard
I can hardly even play IWBTG on keyboard LUL
ppl dogpile on n64 for no fucking reason bro
just saying that alot of games took proper advantage of the controller
and playing these game today isn't super easy because of that
everyone i know says its mid
then you clearly don't know me
but also its true that I really dont like most of the n64's library
tho i'm ngl I also do say taht the dreamcast came out too early for what it was
There aren't a TON of great N64 games
I tried sm64 on switch and I never got used to the way camera works
Any rare game on n64 ios certified banger
i grew up on it and had the best memories with any game with it
To be fair, when N64 came out, everyone hated the cameras then too
I just think the snes and the gamecube are much more stacked
the gamecube is the most stacked console imo
so many fucking SSS tier games

OoT and MM where super important to my like vg experience as a whole, especially mm
ps2 was THE console in latin america, ngl
yeah stonk has been playing them for the first time recently framzo
hes almost done with mm, just finished the anju and kafei quest like 2 days ago

@Skulldude_Real Yeah I saw some of it live, I will prob watch the whole Vod again especially for MM, kinda want to see people playing it blind and it's pretty hard considering the game it is
that questline has so much in terms of char development and feels
i never could get into the zelda games ngl
one of my favorite in the game
I played twilight princess as a kid but was too dumb to figure out how to beat the first dungeon
zelda is my favorite game series ever
i can understand ppl not feeling top down zelda or zelda 2 but like, the 3d ones are some of the best adventure games
i replay at least 2 zelda games like every year cuz its just that good
the 3d zeldas seem very boring to me ngl
ww isn't so much like a classic 3d zelda but it's a very refined experience
OoT can't be played blind anymore unfortunately. Everyone knows you time travel, they know about epona, shiek, etc
somehow a lot of that wasn't SUPER obvious when it came out
I dont know almost anything about OoT
MM somehow not being as popular can still have that, which is why i'll enjoy the hell out of stonk blind play
kill the animals is a super metroid thing after all

like zelda wasn't huge here until botw got released

anyway, I have to pick up my brother at school, I'll be back, better not clear while i'm gone

very yucky boss compared to all the other bosses
i am a distraction ordered to distract read my message :)

that's the area after mecha birdo, that section from any entrance

why are the biggest game releases always so scuffed

So I kind of feel like part of it is that the consumers are suckers LUL
idk elden ring was one of the biggest releases in recent times and that game is very highly regarded

the screenshake makes me feel a little sick sometimes
justice guy is the prettiest fangame by a very large margin
I think it's just music even?
whale is taken from darius series iirc
i'm not too big of a fan of justice guy, visually and music wise it's amazing, but i'm not super big on the gameplay
it's good but it's just not for me
I want to make a justice guy inspired fangame
but I have no experience in gamemaking so
i'm back from running all over the place
thanks for stalling for content for me Max
